seo.title: Circularity, Municipal Waste (EU27, technical)
seo.description: Technical page with global filters, aggregations (simple vs weighted), derived metrics, correlations, and formulas (KaTeX). Eurostat (env_wasmun).
h1.title: EU27 Circularity (technical view)
h1.subtitle: Global filters · simple/weighted mean · multiple dimensions · KaTeX formulas · auditable (Eurostat env_wasmun).
kpi.title: 2A) KPIs (current subset)
kpi.note: Applied to the current subset and year. The mean follows the aggregation mode.
rank.title: 2B) Ranking % of the active metric
rank.note: Ordered by RCY. Dashed line = mean in the selected aggregation mode.
donuts.title: 2C) Composition RCY, BIO, INC, LND, Other
donuts.note: Top-5, Median and Bottom-5 (by operation/year). Donuts sum to 100%.
trend.title: 2D) Trends — % of the selected operation
trend.note: Top-5 (base year) highlighted; EU target (65% RCY) in purple where applicable.
endline.title: 2E) End-of-line LND + INC (ranking)
endline.note: The smaller the bar, the more circular the system. Purple line: ≤10% landfill target (2035).
stack.title: 2F) 100% bars by country (full composition)
stack.note: Each bar sums to 100% (RCY, BIO, INC, LND, Other). Ordered by the active metric.
sm.title: 2G) Small multiples, average evolution (unweighted)
sm.note: Annual subset averages for RCY, BIO, INC and LND.
trade.title: 2H) Trade-off, RCY vs End-of-line
trade.note: Each dot = country. X: RCY (%); Y: LND+INC (%).
box.title: 2I) Boxplot distribution of the active metric
box.note: Min · Q1 · Median · Q3 · Max (current subset).
box.label: Distribution
corr.title: 2J) Correlation between operations
corr.note: Pearson matrix in the base year (current subset) RCY, BIO, INC, LND, END.
credits.title: 3) Citations and licences (auditable)
credits.source.label: Source:
credits.source.value: Eurostat — Municipal waste by waste management operations (env_wasmun).
credits.extraction.label: Extraction date:
credits.reuse.label: Reuse:
credits.reuse.tail: in accordance with the Eurostat reuse notice. Logos/brands excluded.
credits.targets.label: EU 2035 targets:
credits.targets.value: Recycling 65% (Directive (EU) 2018/851) · Landfill ≤10% (Directive (EU) 2018/850). Purple lines represent these targets.
credits.transforms.label: Transformations:
credits.transforms.value: shares (%), end-of-line (= LND+INC), “Other” (= 100 − RCY − BIO − INC − LND), statistics and correlations per formulas.
cta.title: Join us and strengthen your ESG strategy.
cta.text: Follow us and hire our environmental compliance, ESG reporting, and circular management services. A technological and sustainable partner for your organisation.
modal.title: Formulas & Methodology
modal.1.title: 1) Shares by operation
modal.1.p1: For each country \(g\) and year \(y\), the share of operation \(o\) is the proportion between that operation’s volume and the total volume of municipal waste treated:
modal.1.p2: If the percentage \(s_{g,y}(o)\) is not provided by Eurostat, it is derived from absolute values \(V\) using the best common unit (priority: PRC > KG_HAB > THS_T > T). “Other” is the residual that completes 100%.
modal.2.title: 2) Simple mean (per country)
modal.2.p1: Each country has the same weight, regardless of population size or waste volume:
modal.3.title: 3) Weighted mean (by annual total volume)
modal.3.p1: Countries with higher waste generation have higher weight, ensuring the mean reflects the aggregate:
modal.4.title: 4) Derived indicators
modal.4.p1: End-of-line (non-circular destination) and “Other” are computed as follows:
modal.4.p2: Values are clipped to the [0,100] interval to ensure visual consistency.
modal.5.title: 5) Correlation between operations
modal.5.p1: The Pearson correlation matrix is computed across countries (subset \(G\)) for the base year:
modal.6.title: 6) Time series and fallback
modal.6.p1: When the share is unavailable for the selected year, a fallback from time series up to the nearest year is used. This is particularly relevant for the “End-of-line” indicator.
modal.note.title: Methodological note:
modal.note.text: Series may be revised by Eurostat (env_wasmun). Annual results should be read with caution: sharp breaks may reflect statistical revisions, not real changes in the waste management system.

nar.title: Relatório técnico — narrativa
nar.endnote: Sempre que LND+INC não esteja disponível no ano seleccionado, é usado fallback das séries até ao ano mais próximo para completar o indicador.
nar.0.title: Contexto, amostra e filtros activos.
nar.0.body: Este relatório caracteriza a circularidade dos resíduos urbanos na UE27 no ano-base
nar.0.shares: As quotas (RCY, BIO, INC, LND) são percentagens do total anual por país; os resultados são apresentados em média
nar.1.title: 1) Nível médio e variação intragrupo.
nar.1.body4: em média, enquanto o Bottom-3 não excede
nar.2.title: 2) Ranking entre países.
nar.3.title: 3) Composição do “país mediano”.
nar.4.title: 4) Trajectórias temporais.
nar.5.title: 5) Fim-de-linha (LND+INC).
nar.5.goal: Face ao alvo regulamentar de aterro ≤10%, o desvio médio do aterro é
nar.6.title: 6) Trade-off estrutural.
nar.6.body: O diagrama RCY vs. LND+INC mostra a relação negativa esperada; pontos à direita/baixo caracterizam sistemas mais circulares.
nar.7.title: 7) Distribuição estatística.
nar.8.title: 8) Associações entre operações.
nar.9.title: Implicações e próximos passos.
nar.9.body: Priorizar BIO, qualidade de RCY e instrumentos económicos. Monitorização por pp/ano e gaps normativos.
